pathway.author: [Mkutmon, Egonw, Eweitz, AlexanderPico]

comments.content: This pathway depicts the downstream signaling of serotonin via receptors 4, 6, and 7, resulting in the activation of EGR1 and NR3C1.
This pathway was inferred from Homo sapiens pathway [http://wikipathways.org/instance/WP734_r74438 WP734(74438)]  with a 86.0% conversion rate.
